INSERT INTO groupware.edsm_document (edsm_form_id, title, content, retention_period, security_grade, drafter_id, draft_date, approval_date, status) VALUES (#{edsmFormId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{retentionPeriod}, #{securityGrade}, #{drafterId}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, null, #{status})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()

INSERT INTO groupware.approval_line (document_id, drafter_id, approver_id, approval_no, status, approved_at, reason) VALUES (#{documentId}, #{drafterId}, #{approverId}, #{approvalNo}, #{status}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, null)
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT d.*, e.name AS drafterName, d.draft_date AS drafterDate FROM groupware.edsm_document d JOIN groupware.approval_line a ON d.id = a.document_id JOIN groupware.employees e ON d.drafter_id = e.emp_num WHERE a.approver_id = #{empNum} and d.edsm_form_id = '1001'

SELECT DISTINCT d.*, e.name AS drafterName, d.draft_date AS drafterDate FROM groupware.edsm_document d JOIN groupware.approval_line a ON d.id = a.document_id JOIN groupware.employees e ON d.drafter_id = e.emp_num WHERE a.approver_id = #{empNum} and d.edsm_form_id = '1002'

SELECT DISTINCT d.*, e.name AS drafterName, d.draft_date AS drafterDate FROM groupware.edsm_document d JOIN groupware.approval_line a ON d.id = a.document_id JOIN groupware.employees e ON d.drafter_id = e.emp_num WHERE a.approver_id = #{empNum} and d.edsm_form_id = '1003'

SELECT DISTINCT d.*, e.name AS drafterName, d.draft_date AS drafterDate FROM groupware.edsm_document d JOIN groupware.approval_line a ON d.id = a.document_id JOIN groupware.employees e ON d.drafter_id = e.emp_num WHERE a.approver_id = #{empNum} and d.edsm_form_id = '1004'

SELECT ed.id, ed.edsm_form_id AS edsmFormId, ed.title, ed.content, ed.retention_period AS retentionPeriod, ed.security_grade AS securityGrade, ed.drafter_id AS drafterId, ed.draft_date AS drafterDate, ed.approval_date AS approvalDate, ed.status, emp.name AS drafterName FROM groupware.edsm_document ed JOIN groupware.employees emp ON ed.drafter_id = emp.emp_num WHERE ed.drafter_id = #{empNum}

SELECT d.*, e.name AS drafterName, d.draft_date AS drafterDate FROM groupware.edsm_document d JOIN groupware.approval_line a ON d.id = a.document_id JOIN groupware.employees e ON d.drafter_id = e.emp_num WHERE a.approver_id = #{empNum} AND a.status = '대기' AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM groupware.approval_line a2 WHERE a2.document_id = d.id AND a2.status = '반려' )

SELECT d.*, e.name AS drafterName, d.draft_date AS drafterDate FROM groupware.edsm_document d JOIN groupware.approval_line a ON d.id = a.document_id JOIN groupware.employees e ON d.drafter_id = e.emp_num WHERE a.approver_id = #{empNum} AND NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM groupware.approval_line a2 WHERE a2.document_id = d.id AND (a2.approval_no < a.approval_no) AND (a2.status <> '승인'))
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO groupware.business_contact (edsm_document_id, drafter_id, title, content) VALUES (#{edsmDocumentId}, #{drafterId}, #{title}, #{content})

INSERT INTO groupware.cash_voucher (edsm_document_id, drafter_id, title, content, accounting_date, spender_id, bank, bank_account) VALUES (#{edsmDocumentId}, #{drafterId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{accountingDate}, #{spenderId}, #{bank}, #{bankAccount})
INSERT INTO groupware.letter_of_approval (edsm_document_id, drafter_id, title, content, expected_cost) VALUES (#{edsmDocumentId}, #{drafterId}, #{title}, #{content}, #{expectedCost})
mapper.select: SELECT al.document_id, al.approval_no, al.status, al.approved_at, al.reason, drafter.emp_num AS drafterId, drafter.name AS drafterName, posD.title AS drafterPosition, approver.emp_num AS approverId, approver.name AS approverName, posA.title AS approverPosition, dept.name AS departmentName FROM groupware.approval_line al JOIN groupware.employees drafter ON al.drafter_id = drafter.emp_num JOIN groupware.positions posD ON drafter.pos_id = posD.id JOIN groupware.employees approver ON al.approver_id = approver.emp_num JOIN groupware.positions posA ON approver.pos_id = posA.id JOIN groupware.departments dept ON drafter.dep_id = dept.id WHERE al.document_id = #{id} ORDER BY al.approval_no ASC;
